sentences.english: We should develop small towns on the Basis of existing county seats and of organic towns where conditions permit.
sentences.chinese: 发展小城镇要以现有的县城和有条件的建制镇为基础。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 萧红故居，坐落于县城较偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: It took only half an hour by taxi from Congjiang county to Basha.
sentences.chinese: 从江县城打车到岜沙，只不过半个小时车程。

sentences.english: The villager people the heart is unwilling, reached this money remit by post the town.
sentences.chinese: 村民们心不甘，便将这笔钱邮汇到了县城。

sentences.english: Slipping out of the village I headed for the city of Jian.
sentences.chinese: 我悄悄溜出村，向吉安县城走去。

sentences.english: By the end of 2008, all the counties should make it as the cities do.
sentences.chinese: 2008年底前，所有县城要基本做到应保尽保。

sentences.english: Most of those killed were in the county seat, also known as Jyeku.
sentences.chinese: 在地震中丧生者大多居住在县城。

sentences.english: The lunar calendar in March twenty-three, is the county seat of the ancient traditional, huge crowds of people on the street.
sentences.chinese: 农历三月二十三，是县城传统古会，大街上人山人海。

sentences.english: Hu Xuebing is on his way to the county town. He needs to sell his tofu at the morning market.
sentences.chinese: 胡学兵正赶往县城，他要在早市上卖掉今天的豆腐。

sentences.english: County, cities and towns in abundance.
Many stores and restaurants have resumed business in the county seat.
sentences.chinese: 县城里很多商店和餐馆已经恢复营业。

sentences.english: We drove more than 2 hours from county, and then walked into the country.
sentences.chinese: 从县城到村里开车要两个多小时，然后徒步入村。

sentences.english: Li lives in a small town in the south.
sentences.chinese: 阿力生活在南方的一个小县城里。

sentences.english: County seat near Town, the old name of Lake pile, into the town in the Ming and Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 县城所在地近湖镇，旧名湖垛，成镇于明清之际。

sentences.english: Located in the north of Napo County, Tunli Tuen is 14 kilometers far from that county.
sentences.chinese: 吞力屯位于那坡县城北部山区，距县城14公里。

sentences.english: However, there is no star hotel with a rank higher than 3-star.
sentences.chinese: 目前，县城还没有一座三星级以上酒店。
